properties.sql:
SELECT sp.Id as id, FROM_UNIXTIME(floor(sact.activated/1000)) as dateCreated, sass.resourceid as resourceId, d.c_operativa_remetente AS OperativaRemetente, sp.Name AS Processo, dp.c_urgencia AS Urgencia, dp.c_origem_processo as OrigemProcesso, dp.c_nome_banco AS NomeBanco, dp.c_n_wf_banco AS NumeroWFBanco, dp.c_n_wf_pl as NumeroWFPL, dp.c_tipo_processo as TipoProcesso, dp.c_nome_cliente as NomeCliente, sact.Id AS ActivityId, ip.c_nome AS Cliente, p.c_servico as Servico, dp.c_categoria_processo as CategoriaProcesso, dp.c_tipo_entidade as TipoEntidade, ato.c_cedula_entidade as entidadeAutenticadora,  c_assunto as Assunto
FROM shkprocesses sp 
JOIN app_fd_info_diligencia d ON sp.Id = d.id 
LEFT JOIN shkprocessstates sps ON sps.oid = sp.State 
LEFT JOIN SHKActivities sact ON sact.ProcessId = sp.Id 
LEFT JOIN SHKActivityStates ssta ON ssta.oid = sact.State 
LEFT JOIN SHKAssignmentsTable sass ON sact.Id = sass.ActivityId 
LEFT JOIN app_fd_processos p ON p.id = d.c_id_processo 
LEFT JOIN app_fd_detalhe_processo dp ON dp.id = p.c_detalhe_processo 
LEFT JOIN app_fd_intervenientes_proc ip ON ip.c_id_processo = p.id AND ip.c_cliente_principal = 'CHECK' 
LEFT JOIN app_fd_agendamento ag ON  ag.id = p.c_agendamento
LEFT JOIN app_fd_atos ato ON ato.c_id_agendamento = ag.id
WHERE sps.KeyValue LIKE 'open.running' AND (ssta.KeyValue LIKE 'open.not_running.not_started' OR ssta.KeyValue LIKE 'open.running') 
AND sass.resourceid LIKE 'dj_geral'
AND sact.ProcessID LIKE '%_DJ'

properties.label: Atribuir Diligência
